emails.body_text:
I've seen request regarding movements on the dashboard for bf environment maybe it's related.
________________________________

From: Pablo Figueroa <jira@dnext.atlassian.net>
Sent: 03 September 2025 11:32
To: Nicolas Chaperon <nicolas.chaperon@dnext.io>
Subject: DCS-1669 RE: Adjustments to the DNext BF Environment 
 
—-—-—-— 
Reply above this line. 

Pablo Figueroa commented:

hi is it possible that some dashboards disappeared form the platform? 
i cannot find them either in the BF section.

example is the EU commission SND and the apparent use SND´s we had.

also missing the individual countries official snd dashboards.
